message.content:
We start by computing each of the requested ratios step‐by‐step using the provided financial statements.

1. Free Cash Flow (FCF)  
FCF is typically calculated as the Net Cash Flow from Operating Activities minus the capital expenditures (in this example, the “Purchase of Fixed Assets”).  
• Net Cash Flow from Operating Activities = –1,028,375.55  
• Purchase of Fixed Assets = 85,889.19  
Thus,  
  FCF = –1,028,375.55 – 85,889.19 = –1,114,264.74  

2. Return on Assets (ROA)  
ROA is computed as Net Profit divided by the average Total Assets over the period.  
• Beginning Total Assets = 13,000,000.00  
• Ending Total Assets = 14,214,117.02  
Average Total Assets = (13,000,000.00 + 14,214,117.02) / 2 = 13,607,058.51  
Net Profit = 835,266.51  
Thus,  
  ROA = (835,266.51 / 13,607,058.51) × 100 ≈ 6.14%

3. Return on Equity (ROE)  
ROE is computed as Net Profit divided by the average Owner’s Equity.  
• Beginning Owner’s Equity = 13,000,000.00  
• Ending Owner’s Equity = 13,835,266.51  
Average Owner’s Equity = (13,000,000.00 + 13,835,266.51) / 2 = 13,417,633.255  
Thus,  
  ROE = (835,266.51 / 13,417,633.255) × 100 ≈ 6.23%

4. Operating Cash Flow to Net Income Ratio  
This ratio is calculated by dividing the Net Cash Flow from Operating Activities by the Net Profit. Note that a negative operating cash flow with a positive net profit will yield a negative ratio.  
  Ratio = –1,028,375.55 / 835,266.51 ≈ –1.23

5. Net Profit Margin  
Net Profit Margin is computed as Net Profit divided by Total Revenue (from the income statement).  
• Net Profit = 835,266.51  
• Total Revenue = 2,637,011.03  
Thus,  
  Net Profit Margin = (835,266.51 / 2,637,011.03) × 100 ≈ 31.68%

6. Gross Profit Margin  
Gross Profit Margin is computed as Gross Profit divided by Total Revenue.  
• Gross Profit = 1,622,011.03  
• Total Revenue = 2,637,011.03  
Thus,  
  Gross Profit Margin = (1,622,011.03 / 2,637,011.03) × 100 ≈ 61.53%

Now we can present our answer in the required JSON format.

{
  "solution": {
    "Free Cash Flow (FCF)": "-1114264.74",
    "Return on Assets (ROA)": "6.14%",
    "Return on Equity (ROE)": "6.23%",
    "Operating Cash Flow to Net Income Ratio": "-1.23",
    "Net Profit Margin": "31.68%",
    "Gross Profit Margin": "61.53%"
  }
}
